work.summary: Develop and test lab equipment with LabView, to conduct physical layer security research experiments
highlights: Minimize power consumption of proposed communication overhaul in a remote sensing data collection system
Use MatLab to simulate signal strength at given locations to find minimum power needed for a link
Development of an OFDM system in LabView for mmWave communications
